column4: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

column5: When the menace known as The Joker emerges, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological tests.

column4: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a gangster intertwine in this iconic thriller.

column3: Drama"The story of a slow-witted man who witnesses several decades of American history."

column4: A thief with the ability to enter dreams takes on one last job to clear his criminal record.
A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
A fictionalized account of the sinking of the RMS Titanic and the love story of Jack and Rose.
